featured.text: They couldn’t tell a cow’s head from its tail in the satellite pictures.
Upon hearing its master’s call, the dog wagged its tail, and followed her out of the room _____.
But unfortunately, even the high resolution of Google Earth is not powerful enough to tell which end of the cow is its head, and which its tail.

definition.zh_def: 尾巴；物體的末端或延伸部分。
definition.en_def: The rear part of an animal's body, especially when it is long and flexible; the end part of something.
definition.example: The dog wagged its tail happily.
